transcript:
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Doctor isko karo aur turant turant paise mein andar turant aana chahiye hatho hath.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Iska wo sangeet wali ghanti to aani chahiye na hatho hath.
Executive: Sangeet wali ghanti?
Customer: Haan jo aati hai na scheme mein sir turant aana chahiye hatho hath.
Executive: Nahi turant nahi aata hai sir wo kabhi nahi aata turant wo late aata hai.
Customer: To hamare ko kaise malum padega ki lead aayi hai kya? Wo application khol ke hi rakhna padega usko bar bar refresh karke dekhna padega kya?
Executive: Aise to namumkin rahega.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Namumkin rahega aise dekhna.
Executive: Nahi namumkin kaise rahega sir baki log bhi to dekh hi rahe hain na sir.
Customer: Baki customer hai wo to dekh hi rahe hain wo le bhi rahe hain jaise abhi abhi maine aapse baat karte karte mujhe jab aayi thi zero second mein maine dekh li thi zero second mein mujhe dikh gayi thi wo lead jab tak aapko pata hai ye to wahi hota hai ki thoda sa fast hona padega jaise mujhe dikh gayi jab tak.
Customer: Sir thoda thoda wo karo na iske andar wo wo bhi isme chalu.
Executive: Notification nahi aata hai aapka notification on hai dekho main bata deta hu lekin notification hamesha late aata hai sir.
Customer: Late late bhi nahi aaya isme aaya nahi abhi tak.
Executive: To ab maine bola na abhi thodi aayega man lo abhi ek do buylead aur aayengi aapki man lete hain tab ek do buylead aur aayengi tab wo teen char buylead ka ikattha notification bhejega tab wo sham ko 6 baje bheje aapko to 7 baje bheje to ye hota hai isme humne laga rakha hai aapka 10 minute ka wo laga rakha hai lekin wo.
Customer: Jaldi jaldi jaldi thoda jaldi kar do na isme.
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Jaldi kar do na thoda.
Executive: Sir isme lagaya hua hai jitna laga sakta tha aap kahiye to main aapko photo bhej deta hu laga hua hai wo aapka aapka call ka bhi laga hua hai.
Customer: Do teen second ka kar do na.
Executive: Nahi sir wo apne aap se nahi hota hai wo buylead ke kabhi aapko time pe nahi milega notification aap uske bharose mat rahiyega kabhi to nuksan ho jayega aapka buylead ke kabhi apne buylead ke bharose notification ke bharose kabhi mat rahiyega.
Customer: Thoda kuch na kuch karo to yaar bhai sahab ek to banao yaar.
Executive: Theek hai sir main dekhta hu sir isme.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Dekhta hu sir isme dekhta hu main.
Customer: Aisa to mat karo yaar bhai.
Customer: Hmm?
Customer: Main raat ko phone karta hu main aapko.
Executive: Sir raat ko ab laptop nahi rahega mere paas main leke nahi jaunga na aap kal hi karunga bacha hua kaam aapke main yaha.
Customer: Nahi ye kaam to kar lena ek laptop ghar pe le jao raat ko kaam ko lena kal kar lena.
Executive: Nahi ab kal hi karunga sir kyuki kal kar dunga aapka kaam tak ho jayega.
Customer: Aur main main raat ko aapse phone karta hu personal phone pe.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai na 8 9 baje phone karunga main aapko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai na?
Executive: Ji ji theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants immediate notification for buyleads.

- Wants notification in 2-3 seconds.



Resolution:

- Explained notification delay due to system settings.

- Executive said he will check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call on personal number.

- Executive will resolve the issue next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, delay, application
